title: Digital Educational Serious Game Design: Convergence of Science and Game Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and understanding of fundamental game principles
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with intermediate expertise in science, participating in collaborative learning using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can create a serious game design document integrating educational objectives and game mechanics according to the DIJS methodology.
Learners can develop more than three game contents reflecting scientific concepts (e.g., simulations, problem-solving quests).
Learners can analyze and improve the balance between educational effectiveness and entertainment value of games through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
